name: Loki
short_description: Loki is a user friendly, auto-formatting, desktop publisher power house. It's aimed to create a user friendly experience for anyone who wants/needs to write. Loki is easy to learn and is optimized for a fast workflow. Auto-formatting in Loki features many different formats. Formats include MLA, APA, Screenplay, A/V, Stage-play/theater, Novel and Comic. Loki is cross-platformed and developed with python and Kivy API. Advanced options will be available for any user.
